name: EGGPLANT CURRY
description: A rich and flavorful curry made with eggplant, onions, garlic, ginger, and a blend of spices.

name: BAINGAN BHARTA
description: A creamy and delicious baingan bhartha made with eggplant, onions, garlic, ginger, and a blend of spices.

name: CHICKEN CURRY
description: Tender chicken cooked with a blend of spices and vegetables.

name: AED LENTIL CURRY
description: A hearty and flavorful lentil curry made with a blend of spices and vegetables.

name: SPICY PEANUT NOODLES
description: A delicious and nutty noodle dish made with peanut sauce, garlic, chili, and fresh vegetables.

name: THAI PEANUT CHICKEN
description: Grilled chicken topped with a creamy peanut sauce, served with steamed rice and vegetables.

name: PEANUT BUTTER TOFU
description: Crispy tofu tossed in a savory peanut sauce, served with jasmine rice and fresh herbs.

name: GHANAIAN PEANUT SOUP
description: A rich and creamy West African peanut soup made with tomatoes, onions, and a hint of spice.
